item.title: 一名华盛顿州男子被指控帮助杀害数千只鸟，他于周三在联邦法院认罪，承认在蒙大拿州的一个美洲印第安人保留地射杀老鹰，并在黑市上出售其羽毛和身体部位。
item.description:
A Washington state man accused of helping kill thousands of birds pleaded guilty in federal court on Wednesday to shooting eagles on an American Indian reservation in Montana and selling their feathers and body parts on the black market. https://t.co/RETGoeFpzb pic.twitter.com/jBpQjPlBv2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 据报道，威尔士王妃凯特接受腹部手术并住院近两周的伦敦医院发生了安全漏洞，涉及凯特的医疗记录。
item.description:
The London hospital where Kate, the Princess of Wales, underwent abdominal surgery and a nearly two-week stay reportedly suffered a security breach involving Kate's medical records. https://t.co/BiE9PlJhdT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 佐治亚州的一名妇女呼吁医生办公室为孕妇和妊娠失败的病人设立单独的候诊区。
item.description:
A Georgia woman is calling for doctors' offices to have separate waiting areas for expecting patients and patients who are experiencing pregnancy loss. https://t.co/KXtoGwNRNN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 根据最新的联邦死亡率最终数据，美国人的预期寿命在经历了两年的下降后，于2022年有所增长。2022年，美国共记录了327万人死亡，比2021年减少了约184374人。
item.description:
Life expectancy in the U.S. increased in 2022 after two years of decline, according to new final federal mortality data.

In total, there were 3.27 million deaths recorded in the U.S. in 2022, about 184,374 fewer deaths than recorded in 2021.https://t.co/zDiJp0s1s6 pic.twitter.com/LFVZxRD8FI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 麦当劳新推出的一款经济实惠的快餐订单在 TikTok 上疯传，社交媒体对这款新订单赞不绝口。
item.description:
Social media is eating up a new budget-friendly fast food order from McDonald's that's gone viral on TikTok. https://t.co/Rr4wFXvO7z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 据美国国务院称，在黑帮领导的叛乱继续在海地肆虐之际，美国于周三从太子港组织了两次直升机空运，将30多名受困的美国人疏散到多米尼加共和国。
item.description:
As a gang-led rebellion continues to surge through Haiti, the U.S. on Wednesday orchestrated two helicopter airlifts from Port-au-Prince — evacuating more than 30 stranded Americans to the Dominican Republic, according to the State Department. https://t.co/J6GZVGtdny pic.twitter.com/GeQjaUPzEK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 一位邻居拍摄到的画面显示，盐湖城东南部发生了一起致命的住宅爆炸事故。
item.description:
Footage captured by a neighbor shows the aftermath of a deadly home explosion southeast of Salt Lake City.

One person was killed and another was hospitalized after a duplex exploded, officials said.

The cause is still under investigation. https://t.co/bTndfxVZFr pic.twitter.com/MSNxV4k5MG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 纽约州总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的暂缓执行其 4.64 亿美元民事欺诈判决的 "非同寻常 "请求进行了回击，认为这位前总统最近提出的请求不可靠、程序不当，而且是基于一个有缺陷的前提。
item.description:
New York AG Letitia James is pushing back on Donald Trump's "extraordinary" request for a stay of his $464 million civil fraud judgment, arguing the former president's recent request was unreliable, procedurally improper and based on a flawed premise. https://t.co/w33mh1fwqL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 丹尼尔-彭尼（Daniel Penny）今年 5 月在纽约地铁车厢内掐死了一名流浪汉，法官周三决定，他将从 10 月 8 日开始接受审判。
item.description:
Daniel Penny, the man who choked a homeless man to death last May on a New York City subway car, will stand trial beginning Oct. 8, a judge determined Wednesday. https://t.co/WSWM0vheX2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: "在政治解决方案遥遥无期、国际社会犹豫不决、黑帮承诺只会带来更多混乱的情况下，海地似乎只能承受更多的痛苦：
item.description:
"With no political solution in sight, the international community dithering and the gangs promising only more chaos, Haiti seems set for nothing but more pain."

Read more in @MattRiversABC's Reporter's Notebook: https://t.co/Nu2X6yiY6h

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 美联储周三维持利率稳定，由于降低通胀的进展停滞不前，美联储选择将利率维持在较高水平。
item.description:
The Federal Reserve held interest rates steady on Wednesday, opting to keep rates highly elevated as progress toward lower inflation has stalled. https://t.co/Pc0LRS6lSG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 纽约市政府官员称，周三一栋在建的 72 层大楼屋顶的隔热材料起火，随后纽约市当局展开调查。没有人员伤亡的报告。
item.description:
New York City authorities investigating after officials say insulation on the roof of a 72-story building under construction caught fire on Wednesday.

Inspectors say safety measures for the work on the roof were not in place. No injuries were reported. https://t.co/6sEbppS0Re pic.twitter.com/TqNcAOYX6E

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 据一位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，亿万富翁商人马克-库班（Mark Cuban）今晚出席了总统在达拉斯举行的第二次筹款活动。
item.description:
Billionaire businessman Mark Cuban, who voted for Nikki Haley in the 2024 GOP primary and is now supporting Pres. Biden, attended the president's second fundraiser in Dallas tonight, according to a source familiar with the matter. https://t.co/wROjNZCZpo

— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) March 21, 2024

item.title: 路易斯安那州的一名校车司机被誉为英雄，因为她在一辆校车被大火吞噬之前，奋不顾身地帮助九名儿童从车上下来。
item.description:
A Louisiana school bus driver is being hailed a hero after she jumped into action and helped nine children off a school bus before the vehicle was engulfed in flames. https://t.co/U4esBR6c2G

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 前尼克儿童频道制片人丹-施耐德（Dan Schneider）正在回应针对他的指控，这些指控在专题片《片场静悄悄》（Quiet on Set）中有所提及：儿童电视的黑暗面
item.description:
Former Nickelodeon producer Dan Schneider is responding to the allegations against him that were presented in the docuseries, "Quiet on Set: The Dark Side of Kids TV." https://t.co/BRGaaRSTHb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 据警方称，两名十几岁的男孩因涉嫌谋杀一名 21 岁男子而受到指控，该男子的尸体在犹他州的一个偏远沙漠地区被发现。
item.description:
Two teenage boys have been charged in connection with the murder of a 21-year-old man whose body was found in a remote desert area in Utah, according to police.

The victim was last seen alive getting into a white Jeep Liberty on Sunday, authorities say. https://t.co/yXjxAjv9rn pic.twitter.com/5j95zsFwpG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 美国国务院表示，美国已将30多名受困美国人空运出海地首都，这是在帮派领导的叛乱中进行的最新一次撤离行动。
item.description:
The U.S. has airlifted more than 30 stranded Americans out of Haiti's capital in the latest evacuation amid gang-led rebellion, the State Department said. https://t.co/YEYcID81ny

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 亚利桑那州共和党参议员候选人卡里-莱克（Kari Lake）正在准备与民主党众议员鲁本-加列戈（Ruben Gallego）展开一场可能的竞争，并为此倚重前总统特朗普的 "美国优先 "政策。
item.description:
Arizona Republican Senate candidate Kari Lake is gearing up for a likely contest against Democratic Rep. Ruben Gallego by leaning into former Pres. Trump's "America First" policies. https://t.co/IcnLPYENMz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 但研究人员说，当我们了解这种疾病的病因或治疗方法时，我们仍然是 "隔靴搔痒"：
item.description:
Millions of Americans are still experiencing long COVID more than four years since the pandemic.

But researchers say we are still "scratching the surface" when it comes to our understanding of what causes the condition or how to treat it.

Read more at: https://t.co/BcNAZqzWSl pic.twitter.com/iaWfRv1xvd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 一艘西班牙大帆船在哥伦比亚水域沉没数百年后--也就是在最初发现这艘船的近十年后--官员们说，这艘沉船上估计有价值 170 亿美元的宝藏，最快将于四月被打捞上来。
item.description:
Centuries after a Spanish galleon ship sunk in Colombian waters — and nearly a decade after it was initially discovered — the shipwreck, with an estimated $17 billion worth of treasure on board, is set to be recovered as soon as April, officials said. https://t.co/L8kjUalhCE pic.twitter.com/A8QWhR13QV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在鸡蛋价格缓慢下跌数月之后，复活节主食又开始上涨了：
item.description:
After months of egg prices slowly falling, the staple Easter item is on the rise again.

Here's why: https://t.co/dwH8Ra3SF9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在纽约，一条与主人共同生活了三十多年的鳄鱼被保护人员扣押--现在，鳄鱼的主人正在为它的归来而斗争。
item.description:
An alligator who has shared a home with its owner for more than three decades has been seized by conservation officers in New York — and now the owner is fighting for its return. https://t.co/S38FQUEWi8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 联邦上诉法院周三听取了关于是否在进一步诉讼期间暂时阻止得克萨斯州颁布一项全面而有争议的新移民法的辩论。
item.description:
A federal appeals court on Wednesday heard arguments about whether to temporarily block the state of Texas from enacting a sweeping and controversial new immigration law while further litigation plays out. https://t.co/oWM3DtGWzE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 西班牙大帆船 "圣何塞 "号的沉船价值约为 170 亿美元，据有关官员称，该沉船最快将于 4 月份打捞出水。
item.description:
The estimated $17 billion shipwreck of the Spanish galleon ship San José is set to be recovered as soon as April, according to officials — centuries after it sank and nearly a decade after it was initially discovered. https://t.co/DIPI5DECB6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 寻找失踪大学生莱利.斯特恩（Riley Strain）的行动已经进行了十多天，他的家人说他们已经开始进行艰难的对话。
item.description:
More than 10 days into the search for missing college student Riley Strain, his family says they're starting to have difficult conversations.

"Put yourself in our shoes," Strain's stepfather, Chris Whiteid, told @ABC News on Wednesday. https://t.co/IyLINVB5wx pic.twitter.com/GdSOnvEn4u

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 海平面的不断上升让国家公园管理局别无选择，只能砍伐 150 多棵华盛顿特区的标志性樱花树，这些樱花树一个多世纪以来一直矗立在海滨景观带上。
item.description:
Rising sea levels are leaving the National Park Service no choice but to cut down more than 150 of Washington, D.C.'s iconic cherry trees that have lined the waterfront view for more than a century. https://t.co/YDl6sgNkdu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国国会正在考虑禁止 TikTok 的可能性，参议员们警告说，这个社交媒体平台会危及数百万用户。
item.description:
As Congress considers a possible TikTok ban, senators warn the social media platform endangers millions of users. https://t.co/ZLY8V2RL80

— ABC News (@ABC) March 20, 2024
